lead_paragraph: Former Washington State offensive lineman Mike Utley, who suffered a spinal cord injury during an NFL game and was paralyzed, is one of 14 players to be selected for induction for the College Football Hall of Fame.

headline.print_headline: Mike Utley, Derrick Brooks, Troy Davis Join Hall of Fame
headline.main: Mike Utley, Derrick Brooks, Troy Davis Join Hall of Fame

snippet: Former Washington State offensive lineman Mike Utley, who suffered a spinal cord injury during an NFL game and was paralyzed, is one of 14 players to be selected for induction for the College Football Hall of Fame....
